title: Ep. 18 - What A Christian Should Do About Doubt
description:
I got an email from a Christian who has been struggling with religious doubts. He asked for my advice. I will do my best to offer some. Doubt is a taboo subject in Christian circles, but it need not be. We all struggle with it at various points in our lives. So let's have an honest conversation about it.
